channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Not Serious Enough To Turn on the Siren, Toddler’s 39-Mile Ambulance Ride Still Cost Over $9,000
item.description: After her son contracted a serious bacterial infection, an Ohio mother took the toddler to a nearby ER, and staffers there sent him to a children’s ho...

item.title: Just one week off social media can improve young adults' mental health, study finds
item.description: A new study shows that cutting social media use for just one week can reduce mental health symptoms, like anxiety and depression, in young adults.

item.title: More People Are Caring for Dying Loved Ones at Home. A New Orleans Nonprofit Is Showing Them How.
item.description: Demand for home health care, including at-home hospice care, has skyrocketed since the onset of the covid pandemic. A New Orleans nonprofit is teachin...

item.title: 5 things to know about the new obesity pills that are on the way
item.description: Instead of struggling with weekly injections, patients may soon be able to swallow a daily pill to lose weight. Both the makers of Wegovy and Mounjaro...

item.title: New limits on school loans could narrow physician and nurse pipeline, educators warn
item.description: Under new Trump administration rules, students won't be able to borrow as much for medical or nursing school or some other health professions.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: Consejos contradictorios sobre las vacunas contra covid podrían afectar las tasas de vacunación, que ya son bajas
item.description: Investigadores de salud pública temen que las tasas de vacunación caigan aún más, especialmente entre latinos, afroamericanos y personas menores de 30...

item.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
item.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.

item.title: For millennials, being a caregiver for family can come with unique challenges
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers talks with Jennifer Levin, author of Generation Care, about the roughly 10 million millennials working as family caregivers, often...

item.title: Caída de las tasas de vacunación y de la inmunidad alimentan brotes de tos convulsa
item.description: Texas registró 1.928 casos de tos convulsa en 2024. Para octubre de 2025, el estado ya superaba los 3.500. A nivel nacional, las cifras son igual de a...
